scripts.typecheck: concurrently -n Api,Server,Web,Tests -c magenta,green,blue,yellow "pnpm --filter @ralphban/api typecheck" "pnpm --filter @ralphban/server typecheck" "pnpm --filter @ralphban/web typecheck" "pnpm --filter @ralphban/integration-tests typecheck"
scripts.lint: concurrently -n Api,Server,Web,Tests -c magenta,green,blue,yellow "pnpm --filter @ralphban/api lint" "pnpm --filter @ralphban/server lint" "pnpm --filter @ralphban/web lint" "pnpm --filter @ralphban/integration-tests lint"
scripts.fix: concurrently -n Api,Server,Web,Tests -c magenta,green,blue,yellow "pnpm --filter @ralphban/api fix" "pnpm --filter @ralphban/server fix" "pnpm --filter @ralphban/web fix" "pnpm --filter @ralphban/integration-tests fix"
scripts.build:all: pnpm build:api && pnpm build:web && pnpm build:server
scripts.build:publish: pnpm build:api && pnpm build:web && pnpm --filter @ralphban/server build:publish
